title: Automation Specialist
job_overview:
We’re hiring a highly skilled Automation Specialist to streamline workflows, manage CRMs, and optimize AI-driven processes

Pay:
$200 for the first two weeks (training period)
$340 per week after training

Key Responsibilities:
- Automate workflows using Zapier, Go High Level, Trello, and other software
- Manage and integrate CRMs (Ringy, Zeepo, Go High Level)
- Utilize AI tools to improve efficiency
- Handle domain integrations and platform connectivity
- Develop websites, funnels, and landing pages
- Implement and manage tracking pixels for analytics and marketing

Requirements:
? Expertise in automation & CRM integration
? Proficiency in Zapier, Go High Level, AI tools
? Website & funnel development experience
? Strong English communication skills
? Ability to work independently in a remote setting

???? Schedule: Full-time, Monday - Friday | 9 AM - 7 PM CST

???? Apply:
